sqlMap.select:
select *, (SELECT C_STATEMEMO FROM T_OUTORDERSTATE WHERE C_AGENTID=3 AND C_STATEID=T.C_EXTORDERSTATUS) AS extorderstatusstr from T_ORDERINFO T
$where$
$orderby$

select ID as id, C_ORDERNUMBER as ordernumber, C_BUYAGENTID as buyagentid, C_POLICYID as policyid, C_CONTACTNAME as contactname, C_CONTACTMOBILE as contactmobile, C_MEMO as memo, C_CCLIENTPAYPRICE as cclientpayprice, C_B2CPROFIT as b2cprofit, C_RECEIPT as receipt, C_ADDRESA as addresa, C_ORDERSTATUS as orderstatus, C_OLDORDERSTATUS as oldorderstatus, C_TOTALFUELFEE as totalfuelfee, C_TOTALAIRPORTFEE as totalairportfee, C_TOTALTICKETPRICE as totalticketprice, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_RELATIONORDERID as relationorderid, C_TUISTATUS as tuistatus, C_CONTACTTEL as contacttel, C_PNR as pnr, C_PNRTXT as pnrtxt, C_PATTXT as pattxt, C_PAYSTATUS as paystatus, C_PAYMETHOD as paymethod, C_SALEAGENTID as saleagentid, C_CUSTOMERUSERID as customeruserid, C_NOTETYPE as notetype, C_CONTACTEMAIL as contactemail, C_CONTACTFAX as contactfax, C_PRINTTIME as printtime, C_RATEVALUE as ratevalue, C_UCODE as ucode, C_LANGUAGE as language, C_POSTMONEY as postmoney, C_POSTNAME as postname, C_POSTMOBILE as postmobile, C_USERID as userid, C_OPERATINGSTATE as operatingstate, C_UPDATETIME as updatetime, C_FENXIAOUSERID as fenxiaouserid, C_FENXIAOOPERSTATE as fenxiaooperstate, C_FENXIAOUPDATETIME as fenxiaoupdatetime, C_POSTCODE as postcode, C_ORDERTYPE as ordertype, C_GAIORDERID as gaiorderid, C_FXSSUOTIME as fxssuotime, C_GYSSUOTIME as gyssuotime, C_QUXIAOTIME as quxiaotime, C_BIGPNR as bigpnr, C_PEISONGSTATUS as peisongstatus, C_PEISONGRENID as peisongrenid, C_PICKONENAME as pickonename, C_PICKONEPHONE as pickonephone, C_BUSYSTATUS as busystatus, C_GUAZHANGRENID as guazhangrenid, C_PEISONGDATE as peisongdate, C_NEWPNR as newpnr, C_NEWTICNUM as newticnum, C_NEWORDERNUM as newordernum, C_CUSTOMERAGENTID as customeragentid, C_EXTPOLICYID as extpolicyid, C_POLICYAGENTID as policyagentid, C_EXTORDERID as extorderid, C_NEWEXTORDERID as newextorderid, C_EXTORDERSTATUS as extorderstatus, C_EXTORDERPOLICYID as extorderpolicyid, C_EXTORDEREPOLICYID as extorderepolicyid, C_EXTORDERPRICE as extorderprice, C_EXTORDERCREATETIME as extordercreatetime, C_FENXIAOSHANGFANDIAN as fenxiaoshangfandian, C_CREDITCARDID as creditcardid, C_SHENGCANGORDERID as shengcangorderid, C_FKMETHOD as fkmethod, C_SHENGCANGOLDTN as shengcangoldtn, C_ISSHENGCANG as isshengcang, C_TOTALANJIAN as totalanjian, C_TOTALOTHERFEE as totalotherfee, C_INTERNAL as internal, C_CASHIER AS cashier, C_ZHEKOUJINE as zhekoujine, C_ISPRINT as isprint,
C_ISMULITY as ismutily, C_RETURNPRICE as returnprice, C_CONTACTMSGTYPE as contactmsgtype,
C_REBATEMONEY as rebatemoney,
C_OPERATEAGENT as operateagent,
C_BACKPOINTINFO as backpointinfo,
C_PAYMENTURL as paymenturl,
(SELECT C_STATEMEMO FROM T_OUTORDERSTATE WHERE C_AGENTID=3 AND C_STATEID=T.C_EXTORDERSTATUS) AS extorderstatusstr,
C_CURRPLATFEE as currplatfee,
C_ISBACKINSUR as isbackinsur, C_EXTRETURNPRICE AS extreturnprice
from T_ORDERINFO T where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(ID),0)+1 AS VALUE FROM T_ORDERINFO
insert into T_ORDERINFO ( ID, C_ORDERNUMBER, C_BUYAGENTID, C_POLICYID, C_CONTACTNAME, C_CONTACTMOBILE, C_MEMO, C_B2CPROFIT, C_CCLIENTPAYPRICE, C_RECEIPT, C_ADDRESA, C_ORDERSTATUS, C_OLDORDERSTATUS, C_TOTALFUELFEE, C_TOTALAIRPORTFEE, C_TOTALTICKETPRICE, C_CREATETIME, C_RELATIONORDERID, C_TUISTATUS, C_CONTACTTEL, C_PNR, C_PNRTXT, C_PATTXT, C_PAYSTATUS, C_PAYMETHOD, C_SALEAGENTID, C_CUSTOMERUSERID, C_NOTETYPE, C_CONTACTEMAIL, C_CONTACTFAX, C_PRINTTIME, C_RATEVALUE, C_UCODE, C_LANGUAGE, C_POSTMONEY, C_POSTNAME, C_POSTMOBILE, C_USERID, C_OPERATINGSTATE, C_UPDATETIME, C_FENXIAOUSERID, C_FENXIAOOPERSTATE, C_FENXIAOUPDATETIME, C_POSTCODE, C_ORDERTYPE, C_GAIORDERID, C_FXSSUOTIME, C_GYSSUOTIME, C_QUXIAOTIME, C_BIGPNR, C_PEISONGSTATUS, C_PEISONGRENID, C_PICKONENAME, C_PICKONEPHONE, C_BUSYSTATUS, C_GUAZHANGRENID, C_PEISONGDATE, C_NEWPNR, C_NEWTICNUM, C_NEWORDERNUM, C_CUSTOMERAGENTID,
C_EXTPOLICYID, C_POLICYAGENTID, C_EXTORDERID, C_NEWEXTORDERID, C_EXTORDERSTATUS, C_EXTORDERPOLICYID, C_EXTORDEREPOLICYID, C_EXTORDERPRICE, C_EXTORDERCREATETIME, C_FENXIAOSHANGFANDIAN, C_CREDITCARDID, C_SHENGCANGORDERID, C_FKMETHOD, C_SHENGCANGOLDTN, C_ISSHENGCANG, C_TOTALANJIAN, C_TOTALOTHERFEE, C_INTERNAL, C_CASHIER, C_ZHEKOUJINE, C_ISPRINT,
C_ISMULITY, C_RETURNPRICE, C_CONTACTMSGTYPE, C_REBATEMONEY, C_OPERATEAGENT, C_BACKPOINTINFO, C_PAYMENTURL,
C_CURRPLATFEE, C_ISBACKINSUR, C_EXTRETURNPRICE
) values (
#id#,
'A'+convert(NVARCHAR,(#id#+10000)),
#buyagentid:DECIMAL#,
#policyid:DECIMAL#,
#contactname#,
#contactmobile#,
#memo#,
#b2cprofit:DECIMAL#,
#cclientpayprice:DECIMAL#,
#receipt:DECIMAL#,
#addresa#,
#orderstatus:DECIMAL#, #oldorderstatus:DECIMAL#,
#totalfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#totalairportfee:DECIMAL#,
#totalticketprice:DECIMAL#,
#createtime#,
#relationorderid:DECIMAL#,
#tuistatus:DECIMAL#,
#contacttel#,
#pnr#,
#pnrtxt#,
#pattxt#,
#paystatus:DECIMAL#,
#paymethod:DECIMAL#,
#saleagentid:DECIMAL#,
#customeruserid:DECIMAL#,
#notetype:DECIMAL#,
#contactemail#,
#contactfax#,
#printtime#,
#ratevalue:DECIMAL#,
#ucode:DECIMAL#,
#language:DECIMAL#,
#postmoney:DECIMAL#,
#postname#,
#postmobile#,
#userid#,
#operatingstate#,
#updatetime#,
#fenxiaouserid#,
#fenxiaooperstate#,
#fenxiaoupdatetime#,
#postcode#,
#ordertype:DECIMAL#,
#gaiorderid#,
#fxssuotime#,
#gyssuotime#,
#quxiaotime#,
#bigpnr#, #peisongstatus:DECIMAL#, #peisongrenid:DECIMAL#, #pickonename#, #pickonephone#, #busystatus#, #guazhangrenid#, #peisongdate#, #newpnr#, #newticnum#, #newordernum#, #customeragentid#, #extpolicyid#, #policyagentid#, #extorderid#, #newextorderid#, #extorderstatus#, #extorderpolicyid#, #extorderepolicyid#, #extorderprice:DECIMAL#, #extordercreatetime#, #fenxiaoshangfandian:DECIMAL#, #creditcardid#, #shengcangorderid#, #fkmethod#, #shengcangoldtn#, #isshengcang#, #totalanjian#, #totalotherfee#, #internal#, #cashier#, #zhekoujine:DECIMAL#, #isprint#,
#ismutily#, #returnprice#, #contactmsgtype#, #rebatemoney:DECIMAL#, #operateagent#, #backpointinfo#, #paymenturl#,
#currplatfee#, #isbackinsur#, #extreturnprice# )
sqlMap.update:
update T_ORDERINFO set C_ORDERNUMBER = #ordernumber#, C_BUYAGENTID = #buyagentid:DECIMAL#, C_POLICYID = #policyid:DECIMAL#, C_CONTACTNAME = #contactname#, C_CONTACTMOBILE = #contactmobile#, C_MEMO = #memo#, C_RECEIPT = #receipt:DECIMAL#, C_ADDRESA = #addresa#, C_ORDERSTATUS = #orderstatus:DECIMAL#, C_OLDORDERSTATUS = #oldorderstatus:DECIMAL#, C_TOTALFUELFEE = #totalfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_TOTALAIRPORTFEE = #totalairportfee:DECIMAL#, C_TOTALTICKETPRICE = #totalticketprice:DECIMAL#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_RELATIONORDERID = #relationorderid:DECIMAL#, C_TUISTATUS = #tuistatus:DECIMAL#, C_CONTACTTEL = #contacttel#, C_PNR = #pnr#, C_PNRTXT = #pnrtxt#, C_PATTXT = #pattxt#, C_PAYSTATUS = #paystatus:DECIMAL#, C_PAYMETHOD = #paymethod:DECIMAL#, C_SALEAGENTID = #saleagentid:DECIMAL#, C_CUSTOMERUSERID = #customeruserid:DECIMAL#, C_NOTETYPE = #notetype:DECIMAL#, C_CONTACTEMAIL = #contactemail#, C_CONTACTFAX = #contactfax#, C_PRINTTIME = #printtime#, C_RATEVALUE = #ratevalue:DECIMAL#, C_UCODE = #ucode:DECIMAL#, C_LANGUAGE = #language:DECIMAL#, C_POSTMONEY = #postmoney:DECIMAL#, C_POSTNAME = #postname#, C_POSTMOBILE = #postmobile#, C_USERID = #userid#, C_OPERATINGSTATE = #operatingstate#, C_UPDATETIME = #updatetime#, C_FENXIAOUSERID = #fenxiaouserid#, C_FENXIAOOPERSTATE = #fenxiaooperstate#, C_FENXIAOUPDATETIME = #fenxiaoupdatetime#, C_POSTCODE = #postcode#, C_ORDERTYPE = #ordertype:DECIMAL#, C_GAIORDERID = #gaiorderid#, C_FXSSUOTIME = #fxssuotime#, C_GYSSUOTIME = #gyssuotime#, C_QUXIAOTIME = #quxiaotime#, C_BIGPNR = #bigpnr#, C_PEISONGSTATUS=#peisongstatus#, C_PEISONGRENID=#peisongrenid#, C_PICKONENAME=#pickonename#, C_PICKONEPHONE=#pickonephone#, C_BUSYSTATUS=#busystatus#, C_GUAZHANGRENID=#guazhangrenid#, C_PEISONGDATE=#peisongdate#, C_NEWPNR=#newpnr#, C_NEWTICNUM=#newticnum#, C_NEWORDERNUM=#newordernum#, C_CUSTOMERAGENTID=#customeragentid#, C_EXTPOLICYID=#extpolicyid#, C_POLICYAGENTID=#policyagentid#, C_EXTORDERID=#extorderid#, C_NEWEXTORDERID=#newextorderid#, C_EXTORDERSTATUS=#extorderstatus#, C_EXTORDERPOLICYID=#extorderpolicyid#, C_EXTORDEREPOLICYID=#extorderepolicyid#, C_EXTORDERPRICE=#extorderprice:DECIMAL#, C_EXTORDERCREATETIME=#extordercreatetime#, C_FENXIAOSHANGFANDIAN=#fenxiaoshangfandian#, C_CREDITCARDID=#creditcardid#, C_SHENGCANGORDERID=#shengcangorderid#, C_FKMETHOD=#fkmethod#, C_SHENGCANGOLDTN=#shengcangoldtn#, C_ISSHENGCANG=#isshengcang#, C_TOTALANJIAN=#totalanjian#, C_TOTALOTHERFEE=#totalotherfee#, C_INTERNAL=#internal#, C_CASHIER=#cashier#, C_ZHEKOUJINE=#zhekoujine#, C_ISPRINT=#isprint#,
C_CCLIENTPAYPRICE = #cclientpayprice:DECIMAL#, C_B2CPROFIT = #b2cprofit:DECIMAL#,
C_ISMULITY=#ismutily#, C_RETURNPRICE=#returnprice#, C_CONTACTMSGTYPE=#contactmsgtype#, C_REBATEMONEY=#rebatemoney#, C_OPERATEAGENT=#operateagent#, C_BACKPOINTINFO=#backpointinfo#, C_PAYMENTURL=#paymenturl#, C_CURRPLATFEE=#currplatfee#, C_ISBACKINSUR=#isbackinsur#, C_EXTRETURNPRICE=#extreturnprice# where ID = #id#
